author: Wzyss
install_msg: Thank you for installing Remindme. Use `[p]help remindme` to see available commands.
name: Remindme
short: Set timers and get pinged or DMed when they complete.
description: Set reminders via command (e.g. [p]remindme 5m or [p]remindme 5m dm) or interactive embed with buttons for popular times and a custom duration modal. Supports user presets and guild-published presets. Timers persist across bot restarts.
